channel.title: What happens in #mopar at 3:00 AM on Christmas Day?
channel.description: [code]<Aftermath> it's 3 am, cocksuckers <Aftermath> goodnight <Aftermath> merry christmas <Aftermath> happy kwanzaa, silab * ViciousPotato (potato@viciouspotato.support.dairc) Quit (Ping timeout) <Aftermath> happy late chanukeaileahuanuka, all you jews <Aftermath> you'd better step off my turf santa <Aftermath> 'fore I bust a cap in yo' ass <Aftermath> WESTSIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIDE <Aftermath> YO YO YO YO NUMBER ONE MOST WANTED AFTERMATH <Aftermath> IN DA HAUS YAYAYAYAYAYAYAYAYAYYAYAYAYA <Aftermath> HERE TO BRING <Aftermath> CHAOS <Aftermath> AND DISORDER <Aftermath> INTO YOUR SUBUUUUUUUUUUUUURBS <Aftermath> YEAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH <Aftermath> YO MY NAME IS AFTERMATH <Aftermath> AND I HAVE A GAT <Aftermath> I NEVER TOOK A BATH <Aftermath> I SMELL LIKE A RAT <Aftermath> I PLAY WITH MY TOYS <Aftermath> AND KNIVES AND STUFF <Aftermath> I OWN YOU BOYS <Aftermath> MY BODY IS SO BUFF <Aftermath> I AM THE TRUE MEANING <Aftermath> OF THUG 4 LYFE <Aftermath> STOLE UR MOMMAS WEDDIN RING <Aftermath> MACDUFF IS THE THAIN OF FIFE <Aftermath> IM GETTIN ALL SHAKESPEARIAN ON YOUR ASS <Aftermath> I HOPE YOU DONT THINK I AM BEING CRASS <Aftermath> IM JUST BEING ME <Aftermath> ME, THE MASTER G <Aftermath> WHO ALL LITTLE GS FEAR <Aftermath> GO BUY ME A BEER <Aftermath> OH WAIT I DONT TO BEER <Aftermath> GO TO HELL YOU FUCKING QUEER <Aftermath> I PLAY RUNESCAPE <Aftermath> I ROLL WITH THE APE * ViciousPotato (potato@viciouspotato.support.dairc) has joined #mopar <Aftermath> IN APE ATOLL <Aftermath> I LIVE IN A HOLE <Aftermath> I LIKE TO SWIM <Aftermath> EXERCISE IN GYM <Aftermath> I AM THE ONE <Aftermath> YOULL MISS ME WHEN IM GONE <Aftermath> I HAVE A KNIFE <Aftermath> WHAT IS THIS STRIFE <Aftermath> THE WORLD IS SUFFERING <Aftermath> I/O BUFFERING <Aftermath> HELPS PREVENT TOO MANY SYSTEM CALLS <Aftermath> ONE OF THE BOTTLENECKING PITFALLS <Aftermath> I AM A CODER <Aftermath> WITH A BAD ODOR <Aftermath> THE CITIZEN OF WRONG <Aftermath> STOLE YOUR THONG <Aftermath> HUNG IT ON A POLE <Aftermath> CHARGED TOLL <Aftermath> ON THE STREET <Aftermath> OF THE BEET <Aftermath> I INSTALLED MY GHETTOBLASTER <Aftermath> WHICH PUMPED MUSIC BY STARBLASTER <Aftermath> I LISTEN TO METAL <Aftermath> BLOOM LIKE A PETAL <Aftermath> SMELL AS SWEET AS A FLOWER <Aftermath> I HAVE MONEY AND POWER <Aftermath> ALL THE WOMEN FLOCK TO ME <Aftermath> OH GOD I HAVE TO PEE <Aftermath> BUT WAIT <Aftermath> DONT HATE <Aftermath> I AM A SUPERMAN <Aftermath> FACE LIKE A TIN CAN <Aftermath> I DONT HAVE TO PEE * spank-java (~minitom19@daIRC-781A333F.popl.cable.ntl.com) Quit (Ping timeout) <Aftermath> I CAN COUNT TO THREE <Aftermath> AND THE URGE GOES AWAY <Aftermath> LIKE SILENTBOB AND JAY <Aftermath> LIKE WWE AND UFC <Aftermath> LIKE NIGGERS AND KFC <Aftermath> LIKE JEWS AND WTC * +casey (~Casey@Anarchy.In.The.United.Kingdom) Quit (Ping timeout) <Aftermath> THE PLANE IS FLYING IN THE AIR <Aftermath> BUT THEN IT GOT CAUGHT IN MY HAIR <Aftermath> I NEED SOME HAIR SPRAY <Aftermath> IMPORTED FROM TAMPA BAY <Aftermath> THAT IS WHERE THE CODERS ROLL <Aftermath> ACCORDING TO THE GALLUP POLL <Aftermath> RUNESCAPE IS THE GAME <Aftermath> WHICH BROUGHT ANDREW GOWER TO FAME <Aftermath> WHICH PUT OTHERS TO SHAME <Aftermath> BUT OTHERS THINK ITS LAME <Aftermath> OH ROMEO ROMEO <Aftermath> OH ROMEO ROMEO <Aftermath> WHY ARE YOU ON MY BALCONY <Aftermath> WITH WINGS, ALL FALCONY <Aftermath> AND ROMEO REPLIED <Aftermath> BECAUSE I AM A FURRY, JULIET <Aftermath> AND JULIET CRIED <Aftermath> SHE COULDN'T TAKE IT <Aftermath> AND THEN ROMEO PULLED OUT HIS GAT <Aftermath> AND SHOT A FLYING BAT <Aftermath> WHICH FELL FROM THE AIR <Aftermath> AND LANDED IN MY CHAIR <Aftermath> I JUMPED FROM MY SEAT <Aftermath> AND ROLLED WITH THE BEAT <Aftermath> DOWN THE STREET <Aftermath> TO THE SWAP MEET <Aftermath> WHERE I TRADED MY BLING <Aftermath> FOR A GREEN ONION THING <Aftermath> AND THEN I MADE LIKE CHEECH AND CHONG <Aftermath> AND SMOKED FROM A GRAVITY BONG <Aftermath> AND THEN BATMAN CAME OUT OF NOWHERE <Aftermath> AND STARTED MAKING TROUBLE IN MY NEIGHBORHOOD <Aftermath> BUT HE GOT RAPED BY PEDOBEAR <Aftermath> AND EVERYTHING WAS GOOD <Aftermath> NOW THE UNIVERSE IS BACK TO NORMAL <Aftermath> NORMAL NORMAL NORMAL NORMAL <Aftermath> WHY IS NORMAL SO DAMN GOOD <Aftermath> ITS BORING I LIKE CHAOS <Aftermath> OH I SEE IT IS GOOD <Aftermath> FUCK YOU CHAOS <Aftermath> NOW I AM BACK WITH MY CEREW <Aftermath> THEIR FACES ARE DRIPPING WITH GOO <Aftermath> I PULL OUT MY MILK <Aftermath> AND STARTT MAKING CEREAL <Aftermath> I HEAT THE MILK <Aftermath> BEFORE THE MURDERS GET SERIAL <Aftermath> I AM HOLDING MY LAPTOP <Aftermath> BEING CHASED BY A COP <Aftermath> RUNNING DOWN MAIN STREET <Aftermath> STEPPED ON A HOBO'S FEET <Aftermath> FELL IN TO THE SEWER <Aftermath> HUNTED BY DEMI MOORE <Aftermath> VOTED FOR RON PAUL <Aftermath> I HAVE ANSWERED THE CALL <Aftermath> GODDAMIT IT'S SO SILENT <Aftermath> LET'S MAKE THINGS START TO GET VIOLENT <Aftermath> I'LL TAKE MY KNIFE AND HACK YOUR THROAT <Aftermath> KILL YOUR SON AND CASTRATE YOUR GOAT <Aftermath> GRAB MY SAW FROM WICHITAW <Aftermath> CUT YOUR FLESH AND EAT IT RAW <Aftermath> CUT YOUR EYES WITH MY CHAINSAW <Aftermath> AND THEN YOU GO "AWWWWWWWW D:" <Aftermath> BUT WAIT ARE THOSE EYES ON THAT EMOTICON <Aftermath> WHAT RHYMES WITH EMOTICON? LOLICON! <Aftermath> I SPIT LIKE NO ONE <Aftermath> I BELIEVE I HAVE WON <Aftermath> MY MASTERFUL SOLILIQUY, LIKE THERE NEVER WAS <Aftermath> TO BE THE VERY BEST, IS MY TRUE CAUSE * SilverLining (I@strongly.dislike.mscp) has joined #mopar * Nintendo sets mode: +v SilverLining <Aftermath> CAPTURE ALL 26 LETTERS OF THE ALPHABET <Aftermath> MAKE A WAGER? I HAVE WON THE BET <Aftermath> THE PAIN IS NOTHING TO ME YOU KNOW <Aftermath> DEATH, HURT, SORROW, WHEREVER YOU GO <Aftermath> WILL FOLLOW YOU FOR THE REST OF YOUR LIFE <Aftermath> YOU CAN NEVER ESCAPE THE STRIFE <+SilverLining> you'll notice that I can /quit <Aftermath> I TAKE MY TOOTH AND BITE YOUR ASS <+SilverLining> so it's not hard to escape your shitty rhyming <Aftermath> BEFOER YOU GO TO EVENING MASS * MissSilabSoft (silabsoft@silab.soft) Quit (Quit: so <censored> annoyed with Aftermath) <Aftermath> SilverLining, I've been doing this for like 30 minutes now <+SilverLining> good job <Aftermath> My fingers fucking hurt[/code]

item.title: What happens in #mopar at 3:00 AM on Christmas Day?
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

[code] it’s 3 am, cocksuckers
goodnight
merry christmas
happy kwanzaa, silab

  • ViciousPotato (potato@viciouspotato.support.dairc) Quit (Ping timeout)
    happy late chanukeaileahuanuka, all you jews
    you’d better step off my turf santa
    ‘fore I bust a cap in yo’ ass
    WESTSIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIDE
    YO YO YO YO NUMBER ONE MOST WANTED AFTERMATH
    IN DA HAUS YAYAYAYAYAYAYAYAYAYYAYAYAYA
    HERE TO BRING
    CHAOS
    AND DISORDER
    INTO YOUR SUBUUUUUUUUUUUUURBS
    YEAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH
    YO MY NAME IS AFTERMATH
    AND I HAVE A GAT
    I NEVER TOOK A BATH
    I SMELL LIKE A RAT
    I PLAY WITH MY TOYS
    AND KNIVES AND STUFF
    I OWN YOU BOYS
    MY BODY IS SO BUFF
    I AM THE TRUE MEANING
    OF THUG 4 LYFE
    STOLE UR MOMMAS WEDDIN RING
    MACDUFF IS THE THAIN OF FIFE
    IM GETTIN ALL SHAKESPEARIAN ON YOUR ASS
    I HOPE YOU DONT THINK I AM BEING CRASS
    IM JUST BEING ME
    ME, THE MASTER G
    WHO ALL LITTLE GS FEAR
    GO BUY ME A BEER
    OH WAIT I DONT TO BEER
    GO TO HELL YOU FUCKING QUEER
    I PLAY RUNESCAPE
    I ROLL WITH THE APE
  • ViciousPotato (potato@viciouspotato.support.dairc) has joined #mopar
    IN APE ATOLL
    I LIVE IN A HOLE
    I LIKE TO SWIM
    EXERCISE IN GYM
    I AM THE ONE
    YOULL MISS ME WHEN IM GONE
    I HAVE A KNIFE
    WHAT IS THIS STRIFE
    THE WORLD IS SUFFERING
    I/O BUFFERING
    HELPS PREVENT TOO MANY SYSTEM CALLS
    ONE OF THE BOTTLENECKING PITFALLS
    I AM A CODER
    WITH A BAD ODOR
    THE CITIZEN OF WRONG
    STOLE YOUR THONG
    HUNG IT ON A POLE
    CHARGED TOLL
    ON THE STREET
    OF THE BEET
    I INSTALLED MY GHETTOBLASTER
    WHICH PUMPED MUSIC BY STARBLASTER
    I LISTEN TO METAL
    BLOOM LIKE A PETAL
    SMELL AS SWEET AS A FLOWER
    I HAVE MONEY AND POWER
    ALL THE WOMEN FLOCK TO ME
    OH GOD I HAVE TO PEE
    BUT WAIT
    DONT HATE
    I AM A SUPERMAN
    FACE LIKE A TIN CAN
    I DONT HAVE TO PEE
  • spank-java (~minitom19@daIRC-781A333F.popl.cable.ntl.com) Quit (Ping timeout)
    I CAN COUNT TO THREE
    AND THE URGE GOES AWAY
    LIKE SILENTBOB AND JAY
    LIKE WWE AND UFC
    LIKE NIGGERS AND KFC
    LIKE JEWS AND WTC
  • +casey (~Casey@Anarchy.In.The.United.Kingdom) Quit (Ping timeout)
    THE PLANE IS FLYING IN THE AIR
    BUT THEN IT GOT CAUGHT IN MY HAIR
    I NEED SOME HAIR SPRAY
    IMPORTED FROM TAMPA BAY
    THAT IS WHERE THE CODERS ROLL
    ACCORDING TO THE GALLUP POLL
    RUNESCAPE IS THE GAME
    WHICH BROUGHT ANDREW GOWER TO FAME
    WHICH PUT OTHERS TO SHAME
    BUT OTHERS THINK ITS LAME
    OH ROMEO ROMEO
    OH ROMEO ROMEO
    WHY ARE YOU ON MY BALCONY
    WITH WINGS, ALL FALCONY
    AND ROMEO REPLIED
    BECAUSE I AM A FURRY, JULIET
    AND JULIET CRIED
    SHE COULDN’T TAKE IT
    AND THEN ROMEO PULLED OUT HIS GAT
    AND SHOT A FLYING BAT
    WHICH FELL FROM THE AIR
    AND LANDED IN MY CHAIR
    I JUMPED FROM MY SEAT
    AND ROLLED WITH THE BEAT
    DOWN THE STREET
    TO THE SWAP MEET
    WHERE I TRADED MY BLING
    FOR A GREEN ONION THING
    AND THEN I MADE LIKE CHEECH AND CHONG
    AND SMOKED FROM A GRAVITY BONG
    AND THEN BATMAN CAME OUT OF NOWHERE
    AND STARTED MAKING TROUBLE IN MY NEIGHBORHOOD
    BUT HE GOT RAPED BY PEDOBEAR
    AND EVERYTHING WAS GOOD
    NOW THE UNIVERSE IS BACK TO NORMAL
    NORMAL NORMAL NORMAL NORMAL
    WHY IS NORMAL SO DAMN GOOD
    ITS BORING I LIKE CHAOS
    OH I SEE IT IS GOOD
    FUCK YOU CHAOS
    NOW I AM BACK WITH MY CEREW
    THEIR FACES ARE DRIPPING WITH GOO
    I PULL OUT MY MILK
    AND STARTT MAKING CEREAL
    I HEAT THE MILK
    BEFORE THE MURDERS GET SERIAL
    I AM HOLDING MY LAPTOP
    BEING CHASED BY A COP
    RUNNING DOWN MAIN STREET
    STEPPED ON A HOBO’S FEET
    FELL IN TO THE SEWER
    HUNTED BY DEMI MOORE
    VOTED FOR RON PAUL
    I HAVE ANSWERED THE CALL
    GODDAMIT IT’S SO SILENT
    LET’S MAKE THINGS START TO GET VIOLENT
    I’LL TAKE MY KNIFE AND HACK YOUR THROAT
    KILL YOUR SON AND CASTRATE YOUR GOAT
    GRAB MY SAW FROM WICHITAW
    CUT YOUR FLESH AND EAT IT RAW
    CUT YOUR EYES WITH MY CHAINSAW
    AND THEN YOU GO “AWWWWWWWW D:”
    BUT WAIT ARE THOSE EYES ON THAT EMOTICON
    WHAT RHYMES WITH EMOTICON? LOLICON!
    I SPIT LIKE NO ONE
    I BELIEVE I HAVE WON
    MY MASTERFUL SOLILIQUY, LIKE THERE NEVER WAS
    TO BE THE VERY BEST, IS MY TRUE CAUSE
  • SilverLining (I@strongly.dislike.mscp) has joined #mopar
  • Nintendo sets mode: +v SilverLining
    CAPTURE ALL 26 LETTERS OF THE ALPHABET
    MAKE A WAGER? I HAVE WON THE BET
    THE PAIN IS NOTHING TO ME YOU KNOW
    DEATH, HURT, SORROW, WHEREVER YOU GO
    WILL FOLLOW YOU FOR THE REST OF YOUR LIFE
    YOU CAN NEVER ESCAPE THE STRIFE
    <+SilverLining> you’ll notice that I can /quit
    I TAKE MY TOOTH AND BITE YOUR ASS
    <+SilverLining> so it’s not hard to escape your shitty rhyming
    BEFOER YOU GO TO EVENING MASS
  • MissSilabSoft (silabsoft@silab.soft) Quit (Quit: so annoyed with Aftermath)
    SilverLining, I’ve been doing this for like 30 minutes now
    <+SilverLining> good job
    My fingers fucking hurt[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: What happens in #mopar at 3:00 AM on Christmas Day?
